thread.section_title: Hotel de Londres Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great for 1 night
thread.title_full: Great for 1 night - Review of Hotel de Londres Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: EmRobbieee
title: Great for 1 night
text: This cute 30 room hotel is in a great location right near the Eiffel Tower. We arrived around 10am and it was nice to check in early. Our room didn't have a view, was tiny but clean & had the essentials. There are plenty of places close by to grab a cappuccino, sweets, food & drinks. The front desk staff were very friendly. Nice stay!
